title: Lira tumbles to one-month low as Trump threatens to ‘obliterate’ Turkey’s economy
text:
The Turkish lira slumped to its lowest level against the dollar in more than a month following Donald Trump’s threats to “totally destroy and obliterate” Turkey’s economy.

The currency fell as much as 2.1pc to 5.8178 (81p) against the dollar on Monday, its lowest level since September 3, after a close of 5.7000 on Friday.

The lira has been sliding recently after Ankara said it was preparing a military operation in northeast Syria against the main US allies in the battle with Isis.

The US president tweeted: “As I have stated strongly before, and just to reiterate, if Turkey does anything that I, in my great and unmatched wisdom, consider to be off limits, I will totally destroy and obliterate...
